coupons:crafting_coupon_text: Craft an item get an ingredient back
coupons:trading_coupon_text: Get a nice deal while trading
coupons:brewing_coupon_text: Use one less water bottle while brewing
coupons:loot_coupon_text: Double the loot of the mob you apply this coupon on
coupons:experience_coupon_text: Get one free level of experience
